Package de.mrapp.android.sidebar

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SidebarListener
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified when a sidebar becomes shown or hidden, must implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildConfig  
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.color  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.layout  
    R.styleable  
    R.xml  
    Sidebar
    A custom view, which allows to show a sidebar, which overlaps the view's main content and can be shown or hidden in an animated manner.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ContentMode
    Contains all possible content modes, which specify how a sidebar's content view is handled when the sidebar becomes shown or hidden.
    DragMode
    Contains all possible drag modes, which can be applied on a sidebar to specify, on which regions dragging should be recognized.
    Location
    Contains all possible locations of a sidebar.
